page.title: 05LIFE IN SOUTHLEIGH
page.content: The majority of the population or either retired or commute to work. The land while rich and supporting a dairy economy employs few.The majority travel to either Seaton,Honiton or Axeminster to work. Shopping and other service facilities are also obtained outside the village. The main centre for the villagers is the nearby town of Colyton. One of the major problems in this area is the lack of opportunities for the youn and the lack of a good transport facilities. The trend in recent years has been for the population to age,thus the school closure. The future for the young is not very bright.
